meanings.sent1: The team relaunched their rocket after fixing the problem.
meanings.sent2: She relaunched her career after taking a break.
meanings.sent3: The cat relaunched itself onto the couch after slipping off.
meanings.sent4: His speech relaunched the excitement in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun relaunched its rays after the passing storm.

meanings.definition: To start or set in motion again.
meanings.sent1: They relaunched the boat to continue their journey.
meanings.sent2: The company relaunched the product with new features.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel relaunched its acorn up the tree multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Her smile relaunched the conversation with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The wind relaunched the kite into the sky with a strong gust.
